the hose is around-the stump around

1. Eg har ikke aldri smakt sånne brød.
"I have not never tasted that- kind- of bread."

"neg. have never tasted that- kind- of bread."

1. Ze gaat zie met mij naar Gent.
she goes she with me to Ghent.

she goes she with me to Ghent.
Ze gaat zie met mij naar Gent.
she goes she with me to Ghent.
She goes to Ghent with me.
2. ... da ze zij morgen naar Gent gaat.
that she she tomorrow to Ghent goes

3. Kpeinzen dan ze (zunder) goan kommen. (West- Flemish; Haegeman 1992:61)
I think that they (they) go come
'I think that they are going to come.

say that you NEG NEG come
